snippet: Bellegarde-sur-Valserine is a French town that has gussied itself up for the arrival of the Tour de France for the first time in its history.
abstract: Small French town Bellegarde-sur-Valserine, hosting the finish of Stage 10 of the Tour de France, will see its population of 12,000 temporarily triple.
lead_paragraph: Bellegarde-sur-Valserine is a French town that has gussied itself up for the arrival of the Tour de France for the first time in its history.

headline.main: A Small Town in France Primps and Preens for Its Big Day
headline.print_headline: A Small Town in France Primps and Preens for Its Big Day
